mapper.select: SELECT aga.attribution_group_id, ag.attribution_group_type, ag.attribution_group_status, aga.attribution_id, a.attribution_price, a.attribution_thumb, agm.NAME attribution_group_name, am.NAME attribution_name, pag.product_id FROM attributiongroup ag LEFT JOIN multilang agm ON agm.id = CONCAT('ag', ag.id) AND agm.locale = #{locale}, attribution a LEFT JOIN multilang am ON am.id = CONCAT('a', a.id) AND am.locale = #{locale}, attributiongroupattribution aga, productattributiongroup pag WHERE pag.attribution_group_id = ag.id AND ag.id = aga.attribution_group_id AND aga.attribution_id= a.id AND pag.product_id = #{id}
